Question.Subject: Moneysavingexpert.com?
Question.Content:
Hello. Can someone do a step-by-step guide on how to use moneysavingexpert.com please?
My boyfriend invited me to join a while ago so I did, but I have only just wanted to use the site. I'd like to buy 2 dresses from very.co.uk
My boyfriend is away at the moment so he can't me help with this. Thanks in advance.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Hi
My advice would be to visit there forum and create a free account and ask there. Im sure there will be lots of people to help you with you question.
I have added the link to sign up to their forum below.
Hope this helps.
